name: Popeye Beach Volleyball
description: This game features the characters of the Popeye cartoon. The player has Popeye or Olive Oyl playing volleyball against Bluto in six different locations. During the game, the player can find a hidden can of spinach to allow Popeye or Olive's to perform strong tackles. Winning a volleyball match, grants the player the opportunity to play one of six bonus mini-games only once, in which winning will grant extra continues. In each location to follow, the player is able to choose characters to be a volleyball partner including J. Wellington Wimpy, Dufus, Poopdeck Pappy, Sea Hag, Eugene the Jeep and Swee'Pea. Winning the game gives the player the chance to play on a higher difficulty.
